name: Space Ranger (namank100)
description:
Space Rangers is a 2D infinite runner survival game where you play as a spaceship dodging asteroids and other ships with your laser blaster and power-ups collected along the way! Use the WASD or Arrow Keys to move around and mouse click to shoot your laser and destroy the obstacles in your way to rank up a high score. Collect power-ups while traversing such as Speed Boost and Invincibility shields. 

By Naman Khurana and Asher Jonah Ramirez Ayala
